pr_title: KEYCLOAK-12749 fix "invalid state" error due to IE requesting favicon

timeline.message:
KEYCLOAK-12749 fix "invalid state" error due to IE requesting favicon

Internet Explorer occasionally requests a favicon before doing the
actual redirect to localhost. This commit adds Undertow to properly
handle those unwanted requests.

timeline.bodyText: You can use org.keycloak.OAuth2Constants#ERROR_DESCRIPTION. The server should return OAuth2Constants#ERROR_DESCRIPTION and not "error-description".
timeline.author: pedroigor

replies.bodyText: Good point. I already changed that locally to ERROR_DESCRIPTION but then I realized the _ vs. -. Thought it was by intention.
replies.author: thokuest

timeline.bodyText:
Maybe you can set a single IO/Worker thread as follows:
.setIoThreads(1)
.setWorkerThreads(1)
timeline.author: pedroigor
